it.bori.jbfw.core.debug.logger

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.bori.jbfw.core.debug.logger.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    Logger Class, simply manage the "out printing logging"
    Author:
    Andrea Bori

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static boolean initialized
      Used inside Logger to check if application has call init method or not
      private static int[] LEVEL_CALLED
      Contains how many times the specified LogLevel has been called, when application "die", it's print all this information
      static int LEVEL_ERROR
      Use this, to "define" an error
      static int LEVEL_INFO
      Use this, to "define" a simply info to userAdmin
      static int LEVEL_WARNING
      Use this, to "define" a potential error, or simply a warning
      private static java.io.File source
      Object containing the output pointer
      private static java.io.BufferedWriter writer
      Object used to write log inside the source

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Logger() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void init(boolean append)
      Initialize the Logger class, with append condition
      static void log(java.lang.Exception e)
      Simply out printing exception, getting message and title from exception
      static void log(int status, java.lang.String message, boolean report)
      Write log inside the output file, and if requested, alert user with a message
      static void log(java.lang.String message)
      Simply log a message with INFO status and don't report with dialog to user.
      static void showMessage(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String content, int Level)
      Show message to user, using JOptionPane.showMessageDialog() method

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(boolean append)
        Initialize the Logger class, with append condition
        Parameters:
        append - boolean if append or not, if not it will create a new file with an incremental name convention

      • showMessage

        public static void showMessage(java.lang.String title,
                               java.lang.String content,
                               int Level)
        Show message to user, using JOptionPane.showMessageDialog() method
        Parameters:
        title - title of message
        content - content of message
        Level - level of error see constant class

      • log

        public static void log(int status,
                       java.lang.String message,
                       boolean report)
        Write log inside the output file, and if requested, alert user with a message
        Parameters:
        status - kind of error, use Class Constant
        message - Kind of "message" need to be reported
        report - boolean, if report to user

      • log

        public static void log(java.lang.String message)
        Simply log a message with INFO status and don't report with dialog to user.
        Parameters:
        message - content of message to write inside output

      • log

        public static void log(java.lang.Exception e)
        Simply out printing exception, getting message and title from exception
        Parameters:
        e - exception to caught
